# Swagger-CodegenCommands

swagger-codegen generate -i API-STRUCTURE.yaml -l javascript -o codegen/js
# Messing about with update for ranking top\_10

top_ten2 = Video.objects.filter(is_active=True).order_by('-rank_total')[:10].values_list('id')
top_ten
